text: Hennadiy Mykolayovych Sushko (; born 28 January 1970) is a Ukrainian football coach and a former player. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:People from Popasna Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Shakhtar Stakhanov players Category:FC Spartak Ivano-Frankivsk players Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Mariupol players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC Zhemchuzhina Sochi players Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Zorya Luhansk players Category:FC Shakhtar Sverdlovsk players Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:Association football defenders
title: Hennadiy Sushko
